类的使用
org.springframework.http.HttpRange

  • 使用HttpRange的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.http
    Contains a basic abstraction over client/server-side HTTP.
    org.springframework.mock.http.server.reactive
    Mock implementations of reactive HTTP server contracts.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.function.server
    Provides the types that make up Spring's functional web framework.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.function.server.support
    Classes supporting the org.springframework.web.reactive.function.server package.

    • org.springframework.http中HttpRange的使用

      返回HttpRange的org.springframework.http中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static HttpRange HttpRange.createByteRange(long firstBytePos)
      Create an HttpRange from the given position to the end.
      static HttpRange HttpRange.createByteRange(long firstBytePos, long lastBytePos)
      Create a HttpRange from the given fist to last position.
      static HttpRange HttpRange.createSuffixRange(long suffixLength)
      Create an HttpRange that ranges over the last given number of bytes.
      返回变量类型为HttpRange的类型的org.springframework.http中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.List<HttpRange> HttpHeaders.getRange()
      Return the value of the Range header.
      static java.util.List<HttpRange> HttpRange.parseRanges(java.lang.String ranges)
      Parse the given, comma-separated string into a list of HttpRange objects.
      类型变量类型为HttpRange的org.springframework.http中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void HttpHeaders.setRange(java.util.List<HttpRange> ranges)
      Sets the (new) value of the Range header.
      static java.util.List<ResourceRegion> HttpRange.toResourceRegions(java.util.List<HttpRange> ranges, Resource resource)
      Convert each HttpRange into a ResourceRegion, selecting the appropriate segment of the given Resource using HTTP Range information.
      static java.lang.String HttpRange.toString(java.util.Collection<HttpRange> ranges)
      Return a string representation of the given list of HttpRange objects.
